Ignore-we had a power outage...again.

On Mar 9, 2010, at 1:02 PM, Derek Pappas wrote:

> Hi,
>
> Yesterday I opened up the Heritrix 1.14.3 edit configuration window  
> for each of my jobs running on 5 different machines.
> I was comparing the settings in the different windows and was  
> interrupted (the windows remained open).
> I went back to the browser window today and found that each of my  
> jobs on each of the machines had a status of:
>
> Finished - Ended by operator
>
> Some of the jobs had been running for two months. Oh well...
>
> Best,
>
> Derek


--Apple-Mail-45--36999260
